Simmons now owns 1,560,759 shares of the company.

messages.body: $PPD PPD Named Clinical Research Company of the Year https://www.otcdynamics.com/ppd-ppd-named-clinical-research-company-of-the-year

links.title: $PPD PPD Named Clinical Research Company of the Year
links.description: "Our clinical researchers displayed the utmost professionalism and competence in achieving this outstanding recognition from industry peers," said Amber Lee, senior vice president of clinical operations for PPD. "We congratulate them on their accomplishments and recognize the talent, drive and dedication our clinical researchers bring to our clients and their research programs, which played a significant role in PPD being named the international clinical research company of the year."
